title: Tear of the goddess suggestion.
body:
Would it be possible to have your tear of the goddess stacks shown just above your character portrait instead of having to scroll over the item to see where the tear is stacked?
I don't see it being a very hard thing to implement seems like something that could be easily done like how you see Nasus's Q stacks or something, just a random idea.

replies.body:
Imagine dying when you could've shielded because you got the last few stacks you needed and didn't notice it upgrade. How ignorant.

Sure, you could keep track of your stacks. But that's not really the point.

But if they were easily visible while mid fight wouldn't it be much easier?

Easy to implement, adds *clarity* to the game just like Rito wants.

I see no problem with it. +1
That could happen! hahaha, seeing the CD on QSS helps me a lot.
its not hard to just scroll over it + you can usually guess how many you have after awhile.

I know, it's nothing that'll make or break the game just a random thought. In all honest it doesn't bother me scrolling over at all, just thought it could be nice to have it set up like most other items or stacks etc are now.
